text: Pianezzo was a municipality of the district Bellinzona in the canton of Ticino in Switzerland. On 2 April 2017, the former municipalities of Camorino, Claro, Giubiasco, Gnosca, Gorduno, Gudo, Moleno, Monte Carasso, Pianezzo, Preonzo, Sant'Antonio and Sementina merged to form the municipality of Bellinzona. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Ticino Category:2017 disestablishments in Switzerland Category:Bellinzona
title: Pianezzo
